item.title: Trump’s pro-coal directives could raise energy prices by billions
item.description: Requiring aging plants to operate after their scheduled closures hurts consumers, who pay the price.

item.title: D.C.’s glacial response to the winter storm
item.description: It’s fair for taxpayers to question why it’s taking so long for the city to recover.

item.title: This pragmatism has a price
item.description: The U.K. traded far more away in its “reset” with China than it gained in trade deals or investment.

item.title: Americans now know what they’re against. They saw it in Minneapolis.
item.description: Federal overreach and shooting deaths of citizens might finally unite a divided nation.

item.title: A ‘geyser’ of sewage turns back the clock on the Potomac
item.description: An urban river can only be as healthy as the infrastructure built to protect it.
